TextView.android:text: Round 1: UNLEASH YOUR IMAGINATION · In this round students will be given an A4 size paper, a pencil,an eraser and a sharpner. · The participant will be stated the name of some object for e.g car and they need to draw free hand sketch of it. · 20-30 best participants will be shortlisted for next round.

Round 2: 3-D CREATIVITY · The qualified students will be given a new A4 size paper and a scale · An object will be placed in front of them and they will told to draw a 3D sketch of it. · 10 best participant will be selected for next round.
Round 3: FULFILL WHAT OMITTED · This is the last round and the final selected participants will be given a print of three views( side , front , top) of some drawing with some detail omitted ·
